I hope you don't mind me answering this, as I am not Vsauce. Mutation is a genetic change in a cell or a group of cells or DNA which change without prompting by the nucleus or "brain" of the cell. This may be considered evolution because according to a dictionary, evolution is any process of formation or growth, which are sometimes byproducts of mutation. My opinion on mutation being evolution is that evolution should not be considered evolution because mutation is not a change for the good

The Frolicat is entirely needed. One time, I tied a laser pen to my dog's collar and braced it up to touch her chin so the laser dot would move every time she turned her head. Of course, this did initiate a positive feedback loop that we finally had to actively interrupt after an hour and a half.

On of the most epic gift fails in science history was a young John Dalton's birthday present to his mother. What he thought were a pair of blue stockings were actually vivid red, not the color a good Quaker woman would wear. He then realized he was colorblind and became the first person to identify the condition, going on to describe it in detail, including that it was inherited since his brother also had it. The condition was originally called Daltonism, but that has fallen out of favor.

Definition of LOOT

1
: goods usually of considerable value taken in war : spoils

b : illicit gains by public officials
c : money

@Mrglowingman a more full explanation is that after the first 303 views (weird number) YouTube doesn't update the views until they verify that they are legit seperate views.
So I could upload a video to my channel and watch it 38 times in a row and it will all count, however... once it hits the 303 mark, it won't update for a bit and they start reviewing... and suddenly I lose 37 of my views, lol.
